title: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first try.

OB: In the library outline view, the first attempt to select an item is unsuccessful.

EB: In the library outline view, I should be able to select any item on the first attempt.

SR: 
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view. It will not be selected on the first try.
